metadata.title: CVE-2016-3088 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The Fileserver web application in Apache ActiveMQ 5.x before 5.14.0 allows remote attackers to upload and execute arbitrary files via an HTTP PUT followed by an HTTP MOVE request.

notes.note: tyhicks> Affects "Apache ActiveMQ 5.0.0 - 5.13.2" msalvatore> No upstream patch available for 5.13. Fileserver feature has been completely removed starting with 5.14.0

criterions.comment: activemq package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.14.0+dfsg-1').
